name: Scott
text: Pizza was excellent.  Very tasty and done just right.  However, not so true for the Antipasto Salad.  Ordered a large salad, most of the pieces were hard or wilted it was supposed to come with Salami, Ham, and mozzarella cheese.  The Salami ‚Ä¶More

name: Bank Roll
text: Great service. Nancy the employee who I spoke to on the phone took good care of me and was patient when I was asking qs. Picked up my food great service she is one of the reasons why Id go back to get food !!! Thank you !! And she liked my Naruto shirt which was also dope!!

name: Erika Schultz
text: Ordered $37 dollars worth of food tonight, and it was absolute garbage. The pizza had very little sauce, and it tasted like tomatoes no spice or flavoring. The wings had barely any BBQ sauce on them. The cookie wasn't even cut, the edges ‚Ä¶More

name: Bowerman Productions
text: Food was good but employees are rude. I have a medical condition that prevents me from wearing face coverings and the employees treated me very rude for it.

name: Vee Martini
text: Tonight we ordered pizza delivery from this Hungry Howie's location on Detroit Ave. and we were VERY HAPPY! We've only lived in the Lakewood, OH. area for a year, so over the last few months, my family has been ordering delivery from a few ‚Ä¶More

name: A.M. Schafer
text: Fast, good, and fairly well priced. Later ours than most. Great service.

name: D-D Bunaisky
text: The pizza was a huge disappointment! Ate two slices and threw the rest away, sent a complaint in but never heard a word.

name: Louis Hruska III
text: Good food and reasonable price

name: Sue Birdsong
text: Never a problem. Always on time. Food is always correct and delivered at appropriate temperature. Pleasant in store and delivery staff.

name: Shawn Silver
text: Coming from Michigan, I love me some hungry howies. I‚Äôve been coming to this location for almost 3 years now whenever I crave it and I‚Äôve never had a bad experience. Everyone is friendly, the place is always clean, and the pizza is fantastic.

name: Proto Man
text: try their steak and mushroom sub. I don't even get their pizza because the subs are way too good. they should really market themselves as a sub place that sells pizza like those Subways in Walmart or something.

name: really mygovermentname
text: This is the one pizza chain I will support.  Hungry Howie's slaps. Chefs kiss.

name: Jimmy Dunlap
text: (Update) I'm dropping my two star review to a one star review. I ordered the Asian wings which I've had before and it's blatantly obvious that whoever made them was in such a hurry they didn't clean out the seasoning tub so I'd taste sweet ‚Ä¶More

name: cal_Levi.G
text: The crust-flavors are AmAzInG!!!

name: Iraida Tincher
text: Good pizza and quick serving. Super good crust and tasty.  Lots of different topping options.  We ordered the house pizza and it was loaded with toppings.  They definitely aren't stingy with them.  It was a good price for good pizza.

name: Tonya Lynn Yerian
text: First time I ordered I was disappointed.  Ordered the steak and cheese sub to only get one sliver of steak and 5 mushrooms. It was all lettuce and tomatoes and crust. Ordered 8 boneless wings that cost 7.99  those were not worth 1$ each.  They were more discusting than chicken nuggets.  Maybe charging 3$ would have been a better fit.

name: Liz Spais
text: WOW 100% the best pizza I have had in ages!!! The stuffed crust is AMAZING, ample toppings. The lady who took my order was super nice, offered a coupon, the delivery guy was really nice. Hit the bullseye for sure!!!

name: Kevin RedBear
text: Great pizza, salads n wings

name: Monica Michalak
text: Great taste and price

name: Hayden Davis
text: Always nice staff. Always Great pizza. I'd call them the ole' reliable of pizza night

name: Romeo Ramon
text: Great food

name: Rachel Perez
text: Very good pizza. Clean place, great service.

name: Stephanie Najar
text: My daughter loves their personal pizzas! Great for a quick bite!

name: Joel R
text: Bada Bing Bada pow this is some good zippy pizza. Hoo haa you guys make me require water this pizza is so fire. Bing bang pow this flavored crust has my lips smackin. Oink oink yum gimme smore. Smore what? PIZZAAAAA

text: To up your game you need better employees friendly helpful type able  to make sure the order is right I stop ordering because if something is wrong they put the blame on you and never try to fix things

name: Laene
text: Nothing special, which is exactly what I wanted. Got a good deal ordering online. Polite staff.

name: David
text: great taste and crust but the driver forgot half my order. had to call back to have the rest delivered without the dipping sauce. get it together over there!

name: Kirsten

name: Sarah Beebe
text: I got a medium pizza yesterday that legit gave me food poisoning. I know it was the pizza because that‚Äôs the last thing I ate that day. Let‚Äôs just say the experience was so unpleasant that I will not be eating hungry howies ever again.

name: Stormy Harley Quinn
text: The subs need more meat for how much bread you have. The steak could use a bit more flavor. All in all its decent.

name: Noor Ridha
text: Online order was satisfactory, but nothing to write home about. Little sauce, fewer toppings. I made an additional in-store order that was all wrong. They made me a sub instead of a howie roll, which I didn't realize until they were ‚Ä¶More

name: Audrey Backes
text:
Always check online for specials. The crust flavorings are quite good.

There are two little booths inside if you want to dine in. ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Hudia
text: When ordering online attention to detail is consistently bad. One time I ordered thin crust and got regular. One time I got a salad I didn't order (yeah, good for me, but still evidence of a problem) I didn't get an extra sauce another. Seems like there is one little thing wrong with every order.

name: Robert Anthony Sr.
text: Always hot pizza and other foods. Best pizza crust around. Love the flavors of pizza crust.

name: J. R. S.
text: I have slowly become a fan of HH over the last few years.  It seemed I only had sheet pizza from here (which just is not the style I most enjoy) for the longest time.  Once my daughter started asking for the gluten free option (in her ‚Ä¶More

text: Never been Inside to Buy Food

name: Heather Pedersen
text: Pizza was good, servive at the store was good. The person taking our order wasnt the friendliest though.  Well be back though!

name: Cory Roberts
text: Menu prices aren't great but search online and there are good deals to had most of the time. Generous toppings and very fresh and flavorful.

name: Amber Singleton
text: Good deals fast service, and there are a few tables so you can sit inside and eat or just wait for your pizza.

name: Steven Lloyd
text: I am giving 5 because it's a great location and quick for me staff is friendly.

name: Sandra Gray
text: Love this pizza. And the Deep Dish is the best ever. Always tastes great.

name: Benjamin Beam
text: Amazing pizza!

name: Shannon Welsh
text: Watched the employees make my pizza with NO GLOVES on. Why are these employees working with food with only their bare hands touching what we are going to eat? Standards are lacking. I do not want whatever is on that employee's hands in my food, my mouth, or my immune system.

name: Ted Powers
text: Good place to go for decent pizza on the cheap!

name: Paul Collison
text: Good marinara, loads of sun-dried tomato in it, which is a great thing.

name: Antoinette Benson
text: I wish your establishment was on the East side of Cleveland, I love your Pizza!!

text: Great pizza and great staff. Thanks for my pizza so üëç.

name: C J
text: Hungry Howies is real good pizza for the price but $3.50 delivery for less than one mile is RIDICULOUS!!!! I never tip under $3 so to add $6.50 for someone to drop off a pizza is robbery. I get having to charge something, but $3.50 is ‚Ä¶More

text: I ordered a take out order via my debit card to be delivered to my workplace. Order was delivered to the front desk and placed on counter. The driver never told receptionist who the order belonged to  and left without me signing receipt.  I ‚Ä¶More

name: Don Wingle
text: I don't know why that person a horrible experience,it's not really a sit down type of pizza place,but there are places to sit if you want to sit! If you want people to wait on you,go to a real restaurant,don't bad mouth Hungry Howies! There prices are plenty fair,and I've never had an issue with them!
